name: Prime Breakout Highscore Server
description: This server updates the highscore of the prime breakout game.

APP_DEBUG.description: Whether to use debug mode to run the app (true/false). It defaults to true.

HIGH_SCORE_SOURCE_URL.description: The source where to read the highscore from.

GITLAB_API_TOKEN.description: The api token you retrieved from https://gitlab.com/-/profile/personal_access_tokens with the checkmark at api. If this is given, the following GITLAB_* variables will be used.

GITLAB_PROJECT.description: The project id or slug (user/project) to update.

GITLAB_PROJECT_BRANCH.description: The branch of the project which should be updated.

GITLAB_PROJECT_COMMIT_MESSAGE.description: The commit message for the commit of the updated highscore.

GITLAB_PROJECT_AUTHOR_NAME.description: The name of the author of the commit.

GITLAB_PROJECT_AUTHOR_EMAIL.description: The email of the author of the commit.

GITLAB_HOST.description: The url to the gitlab host that should be used.

GITLAB_PROJECT_FILE_PATH.description: The path to the file on the branch in the project.

HOSTNAME.description: If you like to replace the hostname of the app.

CACHE_REQUESTED_URLS_FOR_SECONDS.description: To speed up loading time, the requests to urls can be cached. This also delays displaying updates.
